text: The Scarlet Flower () is a 1952 Soviet animated movie directed by Lev Atamanov.Персонажи «Союзмультфильма» начали путешествие по станциям МосметроАЛЕНЬКИЙ ЦВЕТОЧЕК (1952) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1952 movies Category:1950s animated movies Category:1950s family movies Category:1950s fantasy movies Category:Soviet animated movies
title: The Scarlet Flower (1952 movie)
